B.T.4382
BATTLE SITUATION - NCON - 29th APRIL, 1918.
The Germans attacked this morning on the front METEREN-YPRES, and heavy fighting is taking place. It is reported that we have maintained our positions on MONT ROUGE, MONT VIDAIGNE, and the SCHERPENBERG HEIGHT. Heavy attacks delivered on our positions east of LA GLYTTE and in the vicinity of VOORMEZEELE were repulsed with Joss.
The right division of the Belgians who were also attacked have materially maintained their positions.
On the rest of the front there is no change.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
29th April, 1918.
Issued at l.20 p.m.
